summary: This document discusses the cost of mobilization of Cuban armed forces and efforts to economize in January 1965. It references a 32-day mobilization of 51,000 men in the spring of 1964, costing the Ministry of the Armed Forces a minimum of $8,176,320 pesos.
title: COST OF MOBILIZATION OF CUBAN ARMED FORCES AND EFFORT TO ECONOMIZE
recipient: STATE/INR, SECDEF, NSANIC, USIA, ARMY/ACSI, NAVY, AIR JCS, DIA, CIA/NMCC, NPIC, TREASURY AD/CI I&NS
